name: rover
content:
rover noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary a person who spends their time travelling from place to place: Their uncle was a rover, never settling for long in any one place.

rover noun [C]
(VEHICLE)
a small vehicle that can move over rough ground, often used on the surface of other planets, sometimes controlled from the earth: the lunar rover that transported astronauts and their equipment See the latest amazing photos from NASA's Mars rover Curiosity currently exploring the Red Planet.
SCIEPRO/Science Photo Library/GettyImages
